2016.tpci.regice.bundle.3: Pokémon-EX are everywhere, but Regice’s Resistance Blizzard attack can shut them down while dishing out damage! This Legendary Pokémon also comes with two 10-card booster packs from the Pokémon TCG: XY—BREAKpoint expansion!
2016.tpci.regice.bundle.4: This bundle contains: 1 Regice Pokémon card (XY—Ancient Origins, 24/98) 2 Pokémon TCG: XY—BREAKpoint booster packs (10-card) Cards from XY—BREAKpoint are legal for Standard format tournaments and competition. Regice is legal for Expanded format tournaments and competition. This offer runs through November 28, 2017. This bundle is only available in the Pokémon TCG Online and is not sold in retail stores as a physical product.
2017.tpci.product.sl.mew.coin.name: Light Blue Mew Coin
2017.tpci.product.ultrabeast.premium-col: Ultra Beasts GX Premium Collection Featuring Buzzwole and Xurkitree
Ultra Beasts GX Premium Collection Featuring Pheromosa and Celesteela
com.direwolfdigital.cake.rules.abilities: This attack does 40 damage for each of your remaining Prize cards. (You can't use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)
This attack does 30 damage to 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)
This Pokémon can't attack during your next turn.
Turn all of your Prize cards face up. (Those Prize cards remain face up for the rest of the game.) (You can’t use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)
This attack does 30 more damage for each {C} in your opponent's Active Pokémon's Retreat Cost.
Heal 30 damage from each of your Benched Pokémon.
This attack does 50 damage for each Prize card your opponent has taken. (You can’t use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)
Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Confused.
If you go first, you can use this attack on your first turn.
Search your deck for an Item card, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then, shuffle your deck.
Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 30 more damage.
Your opponent reveals their hand. Add a card you find there to their Prize cards face down. (You can’t use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)
Discard the top card of your opponent's deck.
Prevent all damage done to this Pokémon by attacks from your opponent's Pokémon that have any Special Energy attached to them.
Your Latios in play have no Retreat Cost.
playmat.prompt.bsp_sm68.lightinggx: Choose a card to add to your opponent's Prize cards face down.
product.bw10.booster.retro.description: Challenges ring out, Pokémon duel, and the battle for Unova enters the next chapter in the Pokémon TCG: Black & White—Plasma Blast expansion! With Virizion-EX by your side, you must lead the counterattack against the failing forces of Team Plasma as they mount their last stand behind the twinned might of Team Plasma Dialga-EX and Palkia-EX! Victory is within your grasp, when suddenly you face your greatest test…the mighty and mysterious Genesect-EX takes the battlefield, supported by devastating ACE SPEC cards that give it additional attacks! Trainers, it's time to break the ice!\n\nAvailable for a limited time!
product.bw11.booster.retro.description: Legends lost are recovered, buried treasures are found, and in the Pokémon TCG: Black & White—Legendary Treasures expansion, Pokémon as you've never seen them will dazzle you! Discover new Pokémon-EX, as well as the return of mighty champions. Find new Trainer cards to revolutionize your battle strategy! Command your forces and drive onward to victory! Locate the scattered jewels of the Radiant Collection! And, above all, hunt for the golden glimmers that signify an amazing find…\n\nAvailable for a limited time!
specialvisualizations.bsp_sm68.flashingh: This Pokémon takes no damage from attacks done by any opposing Pokémon that has Special Energy attached.
tpci.data.decks.pcds.solarstrike.retro.d: The valiant Sun Pokémon Volcarona commands the battlefield in the Solar Strike theme deck! As it torments your opponents with the Leech Life attack and calls reinforcements with Solar Transporter, Glalie and Ursaring move into position for their own fiendish offensive, and Blastoise's Deluge Ability ensures your attacks have the Energy they need. It won't be long before your foes are blinded by your brilliance!\n\nAvailable for a limited time!
tpci.data.products.bundles.mindwipebundl: The powerful Paleozoic Pokémon Genesect explodes into action in the Mind Wipe theme deck! As its Jet Impact attack deals devastating destruction, Reuniclus reduces retaliation with Barrier Attack, and Kangaskhan pulls Pokémon into play with Call for Family. As this bewildering onslaught comes to a close, your rivals will be mired in the memories of their defeats!\n\nAvailable for a limited time!
